member.name: P:CMS.PortalControls.CMSAbstractWebPart.CacheItemName
member.summary: Name of the cache item the control will use.
member.remarks: By setting this name dynamically, you can achieve caching based on URL parameter or some other variable - simply put the value of the parameter to the CacheItemName property. If no value is set, the control stores its content to the item named "URL|ControlID".

member.name: P:CMS.PortalControls.CMSAbstractWebPart.CacheDependencies
member.summary: Cache dependencies, each cache dependency on a new line.

member.name: P:CMS.PortalControls.CMSAbstractWebPart.CacheMinutes
member.summary: Number of minutes the retrieved content is cached for. Zero indicates that the content will not be cached.
member.remarks: This parameter allows you to set up caching of content so that it's not retrieved from the database each time a user requests the page.
